thread.title: A Maybach for the WaBenzi: We Ride in the G650 Landaulet, the Most Ludicrous G-Wagen Ever!
thread.title_full: A Maybach for the WaBenzi: We Ride in the G650 Landaulet, the Most Ludicrous G-Wagen Ever!

author: Jens Meiners
title: A Maybach for the WaBenzi: We Ride in the G650 Landaulet, the Most Ludicrous G-Wagen Ever!
text:
- WaBenzi , in the Bantu language of Swahili, denotes politicians; it literally means “the people who drive in a Benz.” When was the last time a car made you feel upper-crusty? We’ve just had that sensation while riding in the rear seat of the most over-the-top vehicle imaginable, brought to you by the fine people at Mercedes-Benz, who took their iconic G-class and converted it into the Mercedes-Maybach G650 Landaulet. READ MORE ›› 
-
